description:
Do your best to make sure that your bike is right where you left it. With hardened links of Manganese rich steel and Kryptonite’s end-link deadbolt design, the Keeper 785 helps make your bike a hard target.

  • End-link design secures the chain within the deadbolt for improved security over traditional lock and chain designs
  • Disc style lock cylinder is pick and drill resistant
  • Webbing sleeve protects your bikes finish
  • Stainless steel keys are coded and can be registered with Kryptonite should you need a replacement
  • Compact design pops easily into your bag
name: Kryptonite Keeper 785 Integrated Chain Lock
